TEXT: The Beast Master is accompanied with his companions. NL They wandered into the spire for a trip and decided to investigate what is inside.
NL You gather all your might and STRIKE at the heart of the spire

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
